name: unathletic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not strong and healthy, or not good at sport: Bookish and unathletic, she hated games lessons. Richard's two friends escaped, but the unathletic youngster was not quick enough. Opposite
athletic
More examplesFewer examplesIt is unfortunate for Jake that he has an unathletic frame and a face that turns puffy and red after exercise.Few world record holders can ever have looked so unathletic.We see that strange moment in golf when an awkward, unathletic body assumes for half a second a sense of rhythm and grace.
